Uses of Class
aurelienribon.slidinglayout.SLConfig

Uses of SLConfig in aurelienribon.slidinglayout
 

Methods in aurelienribon.slidinglayout that return SLConfig
 SLConfig SLConfig.beginGrid(int row, int col)
          Places a sub-grid in the specified region of the current grid.
 SLConfig SLConfig.col(float relativeWidth)
          Adds a flexible column to the current grid that will resize according to the application resize events.
 SLConfig SLConfig.col(int width)
          Adds a column with a fixed width, in pixels.
 SLConfig SLConfig.endGrid()
          Ends the current grid, and returns to its parent.
 SLConfig SLConfig.gap(int hgap, int vgap)
          Sets the global horizontal and vertical gaps between components, in pixels.
 SLConfig SLConfig.place(int row, int col, java.awt.Component cmp)
          Places a component in the specified region of the current grid.
 SLConfig SLConfig.row(float relativeHeight)
          Adds a flexible row to the current grid that will resize according to the application resize events.
 SLConfig SLConfig.row(int height)
          Adds a row with a fixed height, in pixels.
 

Methods in aurelienribon.slidinglayout with parameters of type SLConfig
 void SLPanel.initialize(SLConfig cfg)
          Sets the initial configuration of the panel.
 

Constructors in aurelienribon.slidinglayout with parameters of type SLConfig
SLKeyframe(SLConfig cfg, float duration)
          The duration parameter controls the duration of the transition of a component from its current place to its target place in the keyframe layout configuration.
